name: webgiangday-root
description: WebGiangDay Lâm Đồng - Learning Management System

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.db:shell: docker exec -it webgiangday-postgres psql -U admin -d webgiangday_db
scripts.db:backup: docker exec -t webgiangday-postgres pg_dump -U admin webgiangday_db > database/backup.sql
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run db:start" "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
